title: Rename Track Package to Track Order and reorder homepage sections

requirements.summary: Update all user-visible copy from “Track Package” to “Track Order” across header, hero CTA, footer quick link, and tracking section text.
acceptanceCriteria: Site header navigation label reads "Track Order" on desktop and mobile.
Hero secondary CTA button reads "Track Order".
Track section headline reads "Track Your Order" (and related card title/description copy is updated to use "Order" instead of "Package" where appropriate).
No remaining visible instances of the exact phrase "Track Package" appear in the UI.

file_operations.description: Rename the header nav item label from “Track Package” to “Track Order” in both desktop and mobile menus while keeping the existing smooth-scroll target id unchanged. Uses shadcn-ui Button composition (do not edit ui components); verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Rename the hero secondary CTA button text from “Track Package” to “Track Order” while preserving its smooth-scroll behavior to the tracking section. Uses shadcn-ui Button composition (do not edit ui components); verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Rename the footer quick link label from “Track Package” to “Track Order” while keeping its scroll-to-section behavior intact. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update tracking section user-facing copy to replace “Package” wording with “Order” where appropriate (e.g., section headline “Track Your Order”, card title/description), ensuring the exact phrase “Track Package” is not shown anywhere. Keep the section id used for smooth scrolling unchanged unless all callers are updated. Uses shadcn-ui Card/Button/etc. composition (do not edit ui components); verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Reorder homepage sections so Pricing is followed by the Free Quote form, and the Track Order section comes below the quote form.
acceptanceCriteria: On the rendered page, the section order is: Hero -> Pricing -> Get Your Free Quote (Request a Quote form) -> Track Order -> Footer.
Clicking the header/footer "Track Order" navigation item still smooth-scrolls to the Track Order section after it has been moved.
Clicking "Get a Quote" / "Get a Free Quote" still smooth-scrolls to the quote form section, which is now directly under Pricing.

file_operations.description: Reorder the rendered sections to: HeroSection, ServiceTiersSection (Pricing), ContactFormSection (Free Quote), then TrackPackageSection (Track Order), keeping existing section ids so header/footer and hero smooth-scroll behavior continues to work. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
